plants.name: Alpine Pasqueflower
plants.description: Alpine Pasqueflower is a small, delicate flower native to the mountains of Europe. It has a white, bell-shaped flower with a yellow center and a long, thin stem. It blooms in the spring and is often found in rocky, alpine meadows.
